content: Huh, this "wind down production" issue doesn't bode well: https://github.com/whole-tale/whole-tale/issues/155
The host seems to be down. I can't reach this URL, for example: https://data.wholetale.org/api/v1/integration/dataverse?datasetPid=doi:10.70122/FK2/96ZRYH&siteUrl=https://demo.dataverse.org
I created an issue to remove it from our demo server: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse.harvard.edu/issues/308
Once Whole Tale is back up I plan to push to bring it back to demo and Harvard Dataverse in https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse.harvard.edu/issues/209

Sadly, it seems that Whole Tale is down indefinitely. I checked with the team. :disappointed:

I just opened this PR to remove it from the guides (which they recommended): #11497

I also announced it here: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/gryuRgzDNyE/m/6DKjMackFQAJ
